speaker: Leo
text: Hey, have you seen the spike in traffic? The new endpoint was hit over 50,000 times in the last hour.
ipa: heɪ, hæv ju sin ðə spaɪk ɪn ˈtræfɪk? ðə nu ˈɛndˌpɔɪnt wəz hɪt ˈoʊvər ˈfɪfti ˈθaʊzənd taɪmz ɪn ðə læst ˈaʊər.
linking: "have you" → /hæv ju/ (v + j linking), "was hit" → /wəz hɪt/ (z + h linking)

speaker: Maya
text: Yeah, and the database has been overwhelmed as a result. Several queries were delayed during peak usage.
ipa: jæ, ənd ðə ˈdeɪtəˌbeɪs hæz bɪn ˌoʊvərˈwɛlmd æz ə rɪˈzʌlt. ˈsɛvrəl ˈkwɛriz wɜr dɪˈleɪd ˈdʊrɪŋ pik ˈjusɪdʒ.
linking: "has been" → /hæz bɪn/ (z + b linking), "were delayed" → /wɜr dɪˈleɪd/ (r + d linking)

speaker: Leo
text: That's what I was worried about. The cache layer should have been scaled before the rollout.
ipa: ðæts wʌt aɪ wəz ˈwɜrid əˈbaʊt. ðə kæʃ ˈleɪər ʃəd həv bɪn skeɪld bɪˈfɔr ðə ˈroʊˌlaʊt.
linking: "should have" → /ʃəd həv/ (d + h linking), "been scaled" → /bɪn skeɪld/ (n + s linking)

speaker: Maya
text: Agreed. Also, the backup system wasn’t configured properly, so some logs weren’t captured.
ipa: əˈɡrid. ˈɔlsoʊ, ðə ˈbækˌʌp ˈsɪstəm ˈwɑzənt kənˈfɪɡjərd ˈprɑpərli, soʊ sʌm lɔɡz ˈwɜrənt ˈkæpʧərd.
linking: "wasn't configured" → /ˈwɑzənt kənˈfɪɡjərd/ (t + k linking), "logs weren't" → /lɔɡz ˈwɜrənt/ (z + w linking)

speaker: Leo
text: Oh no. Was the incident reported to the SRE team?
ipa: oʊ noʊ. wəz ði ˈɪnsɪdənt rɪˈpɔrtɪd tu ði ˌɛs.ɑrˈi tim?
linking: "was the" → /wəz ði/ (z + ð linking), "reported to" → /rɪˈpɔrtɪd tu/ (d + t linking)

speaker: Maya
text: Yes, an alert was generated automatically and was sent to their Slack channel.
ipa: jɛs, ən əˈlɜrt wəz ˈʤɛnəˌreɪtɪd ˌɔtəˈmætɪkli ənd wəz sɛnt tu ðɛr slæk ˈʧænəl.
linking: "was generated" → /wəz ˈʤɛnəˌreɪtɪd/ (z + ʤ linking), "sent to" → /sɛnt tu/ (t + t linking)

speaker: Leo
text: That’s good. I guess the mitigation plan needs to be updated now.
ipa: ðæts ɡʊd. aɪ ɡɛs ðə ˌmɪtɪˈɡeɪʃən plæn nidz tu bi ˈʌpˌdeɪtɪd naʊ.
linking: "needs to" → /nidz tu/ (z + t linking), "be updated" → /bi ˈʌpˌdeɪtɪd/ (i + ʌ linking)

speaker: Maya
text: Definitely. And we are going to be asked to present a postmortem next week.
ipa: ˈdɛfənətli. ənd wi ɑr ˈɡoʊɪŋ tu bi æskt tu prɪˈzɛnt ə ˈpoʊstˌmɔrtəm nɛkst wik.
linking: "going to" → /ˈɡoʊɪŋ tu/ (ŋ + t linking), "be asked" → /bi æskt/ (i + æ linking)

speaker: Leo
text: Let’s make sure all root causes are documented clearly.
ipa: lɛts meɪk ʃʊr ɔl rut ˈkɔzɪz ɑr ˈdɑkjəˌmɛntɪd ˈklɪrli.
linking: "root causes" → /rut ˈkɔzɪz/ (t + k linking), "are documented" → /ɑr ˈdɑkjəˌmɛntɪd/ (r + d linking)

speaker: Maya
text: Agreed. A few actions have already been assigned to different team members.
ipa: əˈɡrid. ə fju ˈækʃənz hæv ɔlˈrɛdi bɪn əˈsaɪnd tu ˈdɪfərənt tim ˈmɛmbərz.
linking: "have already" → /hæv ɔlˈrɛdi/ (v + ɔ linking), "been assigned" → /bɪn əˈsaɪnd/ (n + ə linking)
